analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/37/0x58f46b4a8db49d0edcc5f25927d20fd2a4b10767.sol#289-292) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/37/0x58f46b4a8db49d0edcc5f25927d20fd2a4b10767.sol#290-292)

Reentrancy in TkoTokenPreSale.pauseCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/37/0x58f46b4a8db49d0edcc5f25927d20fd2a4b10767.sol#924-928):
	External calls:
	- TkoToken(token).pause() (/unique_chucks/37/0x58f46b4a8db49d0edcc5f25927d20fd2a4b10767.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- paused (/unique_chucks/37/0x58f46b4a8db49d0edcc5f25927d20fd2a4b10767.sol)

Reentrancy in TkoTokenPreSale.unpauseCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/37/0x58f46b4a8db49d0edcc5f25927d20fd2a4b10767.sol):
	External calls:
	- TkoToken(token).unpause() (/unique_chucks/37/0x58f46b4a8db49d0edcc5f25927d20fd2a4b10767.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- paused (/unique_chucks/37/0x58f46b4a8db49d0edcc5f25927d20fd2a4b10767.sol)
